_source.message:
As far as I can see the Marjorie Taylor Greene takedown has been well planned. She is fully based. A legit truther in Washington, on the world stage (most recently giving the SOTU response) who doesn't hold her tongue. She's introducing concepts that are typically only seen in our circles to a Main Stream Republican Normie Audience... 
Quite literally the establishments worst nightmare.

One problem... she got 70% of the vote. 
Taking her down will not be easy.
It started last summer when their planted "Patriots" starting to sow seeds of doubt... attacking her... trying to split us on MTG from within. This is how they always start. 
Anyone who's been at this for a while has seen them attempt this with Trump many times. 

It's called a "Concern Troll" . 
It's the oldest trick in the book and typically only snags the newly awakened with vague connections and pseudo "sauce" that can typically be attributed to many and only seems dire when presented as such. 

Now that this poisoning of well has been underway for nearly a year they have started the 2nd part of their attack. Using the Media and the Courts in a very public Attack. (Kick em when they're down) just ask Eric Holder... 

Well, I fully believe that they will not succeed in this laughable (and predictable) attempt to remove one of our Greatest Warriors from Congress. Furthermore, I suspect they can prepare to see many more Marjorie Taylor Greenes in the future. üòé This is only the beginning

Well, I fully believe that they will not succeed in this laughable (and predictable) attempt to remove one of our Greatest Warriors from Congress. Furthermore, I suspect they can prepare to see many more Marjorie Taylor Greenes in the future. üòé This is only the beginning

‚ÄºÔ∏èA SECRET NATO BIOLOGICAL WEAPONS LABORATORY IN THE MARIUPOL UNDERGROUND?

"In the basement of the two steel mills in Azovstal, about three thousand soldiers and fighters are still hidden. In the reconstruction provided by Escobar, the presence of several military advisors from the Atlantic Alliance countries is reported. The secret NATO facility is said to be under the command of U.S. Lieutenant General Roger L. Cloutier, who was arrested by DNR militias during an attempted escape by helicopter.

The Pit-404 laboratory, according to Escobar's reconstruction, was a structure dedicated to the study of chemical and biological weapons. More than three hundred military consultants would be trapped in the tunnels, officers from Germany, Canada, the United States, France, Italy, Poland, Turkey, Sweden and Greece.

It would be linked to the siege of the underground tunnels of Azovstal, to the dismissal of Eric Vido, head of French military intelligence. General Vido was dismissed after only seven months in office by President Macron "for shortcomings in intelligence work during the Ukrainian crisis." In recent days, a video posted on social networks, a green beret of the French Legion was found. The dramatic situation in the dungeons of Marioupol is enough to explain the diplomatic efforts of France and Germany to create humanitarian corridors useful for the exfiltration of foreign officers who should not be there.

Mariupol has become the epicenter of the confrontation and is so fiercely defended because it has been the center of aggression in the Donbass for years and one of the cornerstones of NATO in Ukraine. Under pressure from the Russian army, barricaded in the tunnels, so there would be not only Ukrainian troops but also NATO officers and consultants. "

https://southfront.org/a-secret-nato-bioweapon-laboratory-in-the-underground-of-mariupol

https://t.me/LauraAbolichannel

_source.message:
QTSR - A SECRET NATO BIOLOGICAL WEAPONS LABORATORY UNDERGROUND IN MARIUPOL. 
CODENAME: PIT-404

"There are still about three thousand soldiers and fighters hidden in the basement of the two steel plants in Azovstal. The reconstruction presented by Escobar reports the presence of several military advisors from the Atlantic Alliance countries. The secret NATO facility is said to be under the command of U.S. Lieutenant General Roger L. Cloutier, who was arrested by DNR militias during an escape attempt by helicopter.

According to Escobar's reconstruction, the Pit-404 laboratory was a facility dedicated to chemical and biological weapons research. More than three hundred military advisors were trapped in the tunnels, officers from Germany, Canada, the United States, France, Italy, Poland, Turkey, Sweden, and Greece.

The siege of the Azovstal underground tunnels is linked to the dismissal of Eric Vido, the head of French military intelligence. General Vido was dismissed by President Macron after only seven months in office "for shortcomings in intelligence work during the Ukraine crisis." In recent days, a video was posted on social networks showing a green beret of the French Legion. The dramatic situation in the dungeons of Mariupol explains the diplomatic efforts of France and Germany to create humanitarian corridors for the exfiltration of foreign officers who should not be there.

Mariupol has become the epicenter of confrontation and is defended so vehemently because it has been the center of aggression in the Donbass for years and one of NATO's cornerstones in Ukraine. Under the pressure of the Russian army, barricaded in the tunnels, so there would be not only Ukrainian troops, but also NATO officers and advisers. "

https://t.me/DUMBSandUnderground/26678

https://southfront.org/a-secret-nato-bioweapon-laboratory-in-the-underground-of-mariupol

#EarthAlliance
     ‚öî üá∑üá∫ WWG1WGA üá∑üá∫ ‚öî

@DUMBSandUNDERGROUND

Interessante "Verschw√∂rungserz√§hlungen" zum Stahlwerk Asowstal:


"On April. 10th gave an anonymous user on 4chan.org more informarion about Pit 404 and about what is going on in Mariupol:

    Under the Azovstal industrial zone, owned by oligarch Rinat Akhmetov, there are 24 km of tunnels at a depth of up to 30 meters.

    >There is also a secret NATO facility PIT-404 ‚Äì and a secret NATO biological laboratory with biological weapons. At the PIT-404 facility, NATO officers are blocked. The tunnels are equipped with a bunker system with armor protection.

    >There are about 240 foreigners inside, including officers of NATO and the French Foreign Legion, as well as biolab staff. Their security, funded by Akhmetov, has up to 3,000 people.

    >The biolab under the Azovstal plant in Mariupol at the so-called PIT-404 facility was built and operated by Metabiota, a company associated with Hunter Biden, Rinat Akhmetov and Vladimir Zelensky.

    >In the laboratories of this facility, tests were conducted to create bioweapons. Thousands of Mariupol residents have become ‚Äúguinea pigs‚Äù in these terrible trials. And mostly Western ‚Äúspecialists‚Äù took part in these inhuman experiments.

    >Some French intelligence officers died during the rescue operation. The head of French intelligence, Eric Vido, was dismissed on March 31, 2022 for the failures of French intelligence in the war in Ukraine.

    >Officers from the USA, Canada, Germany, France, Italy, Turkey, Sweden, Poland and Greece are now blocked in the dungeons of Azovstal. American Lieutenant General Roger Clothier, captured by the People‚Äôs Militia of the DPR the other day from a downed helicopter, was tracked by the GRU of the General Staff and the SVR of Russia in Mariupol based on the results of external surveillance of his mistress in Turkey in Izmir."

https://expmx.com/2022/04/11/bio-military-experiments-in-pit-404-a-secret-nato-biological-laboratory-30-meters-deep-under-the-azovstal-in-mariupol/
